title: Lake Shore Escape
description: [Siren Classic: Erotic Contemporary Romantic Suspense] Samantha Brooks' routine life as a waitress is about to be turned upside down by more than one man. Unfortunately, one of those men is trying to kill her, while the other would stop at nothing to save her. One of those men is Dr. Jared Dalton, and he's not your average doctor. He's young, good looking and yet completely alone. Neither of them are prepared for the chain of events that have their lives forever changed and intertwined. The sexual tension between them builds as they try to resist the temptations of the flesh, but when they give in--well, they're a perfect match. Jared couldn't have dreamed up a more ideal woman for himself, and he only wants to pleasure her in every way possible. As fate would have it, Jared and Samantha must fight to stay together as a twisted serial killer aims at Samantha as his final target. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Moira Hanson
